mapper.select: select member_id, tb_order.order_id, ordered_item_id, product_name, quantity, price, rental_type, startdate, enddate, total_price, state, orderdate from tb_order, tb_ordered_item, product where member_id = #{member_id} and tb_order.order_id = tb_ordered_item.order_id and tb_ordered_item.product_id = product.product_id order by order_id
